name: 约翰·托马斯·高蒂尔
name_full: 约翰·托马斯·高蒂尔 John Thomas Gauthier
introduction: John Thomas Gauthier was born in Ottawa, Ontario Canada in 1984. Discovering his love of performance at a young age, he participated in various school plays, as well as made home movies with family and friends. After attending Algonquin College and many years as a bartender, he moved to Toronto, Canada in 2017 to take a serious shot at acting professionally. Already working with some big names on various projects, he hopes to continue his journey up the ladder, entertaining the masses for years to come.In addition to acting, he also writes, produces, directs, and does various forms of stunt work.
